title: Looking to buy groups of t209s or t210s
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking to buy groups of t209s or t210s
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

I'd like to start a new set this year that involves either one of the t210 issues or possibly even t209s or t211s if the right group is out there.  Anyone have groups or partial sets that you've gotten tired of that you'd be willing to part with?  I still have some tradebait available if that helps.  Thanks in advance!

Brian
